messages.message:
Thanks so much for connecting with me on Linkedin Brian, as I am always looking to grow my network, and Linkedin is usually one of my first stops to find candidates for new roles that I am working on. As I mentioned in my message earlier as well, I have a few well paying roles in the Phoenix, AZ area, that I think would be a great fit for your background based on your work with Swiftpage, Study Sauce, and EPIC Research and Diagnostics. I would greatly appreciate it if you could give me a call at 571-612-3946 at your earliest convenience, or send me some times that you would be available for a brief conversation, along with the best number to reach you. Thanks again for connecting with me Brian and I look forward to hearing from you!

Regards,
Jason Monkelien
Technical Recruiter | Princeton Information
11600 Sunrise Valley Dr, Suite 270
Reston, VA 20191
Tel: 571-612-3946
Jmonkelien@princetoninformation.com
